DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate validate diagnostic prediction model appropriate diagnosis Acute Heart Failure ( AHF ) patient present emergency department undifferentiated dyspnea .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Validated Diagnostic Prediction Model Acute Heart Failure Emergency Department
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year Presentation ED undifferentiated shortness breath Dyspnea obvious cause , e.g . chest trauma , obvious clinical exacerbation know chronic obstructive disease Obvious pulmonary edema patient know diagnosis HF recently admit hospital HF Clinician plan treat AHF , rather pursue cause dyspnea ( i.e. , probability AHF ≤ 20 % ) Clinician plan treat AHF pursue cause dyspnea ( i.e. , probability AHF ≥ 80 % ) Acute coronary syndrome within one month Chronic renal failure ( serum creatinine ≥ 250 mol/l ) Anticipated life expectancy < 6 month due noncardiovascular cause Participation another interventional outcome trial Inability obtain informed consent , include inability patient understand English
